subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: After emerging as the Mets’ most reliable left-handed reliever last season, 30-year-old Pedro Feliciano has not allowed an earned run this season in 13 1/3 innings.
snippet: After emerging as the Mets’ most reliable left-handed reliever last season, 30-year-old Pedro Feliciano has not allowed an earned run this season in 13 1/3 innings.
